title: Technical Database Engineer
subtitle: Google LLC
description: Google is an American multinational technology company that specializes in internet-related services and products. It was founded in 1998 by Larry Page and Sergey Brin while they were Ph.D. students at Stanford University. The company is headquartered in Mountain View, California, and is currently one of the world's largest technology companies in terms of revenue and market capitalization.
responsibility: Collaborating with cross-functional teams: UI/UX designers often work closely with other teams, including product management, engineering, and marketing, to ensure that the user interface is aligned with business and technical requirements. You will need to be able to effectively communicate your design ideas and gather feedback from other team members.
requirements: Bachelor degree to complete any reputational university.

title: Senior Product Designer
subtitle: Netflix
description: Netflix is a popular streaming service that offers a wide range of movies, TV shows, and original programming to subscribers around the world. The company was founded in 1997 as a DVD-by-mail service, but has since transitioned to an online streaming platform.
responsibility: Netflix allows subscribers to access its content on a variety of devices, including smartphones, tablets, smart TVs, and gaming consoles. The company offers a range of subscription plans with different prices and features, such as the ability to stream content in high definition or download content for offline viewing.
requirements: Bachelor degree to complete any reputational university.
